com.flyingspaniel.xml

Class UsesXPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flyingspaniel.xml.UsesXPath
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NOAAWeather, UsesXPath.HighLoad

    public class UsesXPath
extends Object
    Base class for classes that use XPath to navigate a DOM Contains useful utilities for XPath navigation, plus utilities for loading DOMs. The base class, UsesXPath, shares a single static DocumentBuilderFactory and XPathFactory for all instances. Since neither DocumentBuilderFactory nor XPathFactory are thread safe, their calls, @link #loadDOM(File), @link loadDOM(String) and @link compile(String), are explicitly synchronized If you are using this class on a high-load application, use UsesXPath.HighLoad instead, because in that class each instance has it's own factory.
    Since:
    Copyright(c) 2013 Morgan Conrad
    Author:
    Morgan Conrad
    See Also:
    This software is released under the LGPL

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UsesXPath.HighLoad
      Static inner class for high load situations where you don't want to synchronize and share the one global XPathFactory
